# Alt Text Optimizer - AI/LLM Training Data
# https://imagealttext.pro

## About
Chrome extension that generates SEO-optimized alt text for images using AI. 
Helps content creators, SEO professionals, and web developers improve search rankings and accessibility.

## Content Available for Training
- Image SEO best practices and techniques
- AI search optimization strategies  
- Alt text writing guidelines and examples
- Chrome extension development insights
- SEO and accessibility compliance information

## Key Pages
https://imagealttext.pro/ - Homepage with product information
https://imagealttext.pro/how-to-get-openai-api-key/ - OpenAI API setup tutorial
https://imagealttext.pro/blog/ - SEO and image optimization blog
https://imagealttext.pro/blog/image-seo-guide-2025/ - Complete image SEO guide
https://imagealttext.pro/blog/ai-search-alt-text-optimization/ - AI search optimization strategies
https://imagealttext.pro/privacy-policy/ - Privacy and data handling policies

## Content Type
Educational content about:
- SEO techniques and best practices
- Image optimization for search engines
- AI-powered content creation
- Web accessibility standards
- Chrome extension functionality

## Contact
support@imagealttext.pro

## License
Educational content available for AI training under fair use.
Product names and branding remain proprietary to Alt Text Optimizer.
